name: ∀ CreateLogicLink Guide
landing_text: $(l:getting_started/overview)$(bold)∀$()$(/l) Welcome to the $(thing)CreateLogicLink$() guide!$(br2)$(italic)For all machines, for all control.$()$(br2)This mod bridges $(thing)Create$() factory automation with $(thing)CC:Tweaked$() computers, giving you full Lua control over logistics networks, kinetic machinery, redstone links, trains, and storage.$(br2)Browse the categories to learn about each block, its peripheral API, and see practical Lua examples.$(br2)$(italic)Tip: Place any LogicLink block next to a CC:Tweaked computer and use peripheral.find() to get started!$()
subtitle: ∀ Factory Automation with Lua
